Graphical Procedures
==========================================


### Boxplots

<h5> Boxplots </h5>



A graphical representation of the quartiles is called a Box plot. It displays 

* lower quartile 
* median 
* upper quartile   
* interquartile range (IQR)   
* whiskers of length = 1.5 IQR   
* outlying observations
